.. module:: pypol.funcs
    :synopsis: Utility functions to work with polynomials

The :mod:`funcs` module 
========================

This module add some utility function to pypol.
Currently this functions are avaiable:

.. hlist::
    :columns: 3

    * :func:`divisible`
    * :func:`gcd`
    * :func:`lcm`
    * :func:`random_poly`
    * :func:`root`
    * :func:`polyder`
    * :func:`polyint`
    * :func:`fib_poly`
    * :func:`fib_poly_rec`
